simple.util

Class do_gui

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.util.do_gui
  • Deprecated. 
    See description for replacement classes

    @Deprecated
public final class do_gui
extends java.lang.Object
    This class does repetitive things for GUI creation.
    Methods here are for convenience and for reducing creation time. Depends on nothing else. This class has grown too big and has been split into 5 classes:
    1. SJFrame
    2. SJOptionPane
    3. SJPanel
    4. SwingFactory

    Created: 2004
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce

    • Field Detail

      • mINF

        public static final int mINF
        Deprecated. 
        These are the message types and determines what icon will be displayed.
        • mINF = Information Message
        • mGEN = General(Plain) Message
        • mASK = Question Message.
        • mWARN = Warning Message
        • mERR = Error Message
        Values taken from javax.swing.JOptionPane.
        See Also:
        JOptionPane, showMessage(String, String, int), showQuestionMessage(String, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • moYN

        public static final int moYN
        Deprecated. 
        These define the options and return values for showQuestionMessage(String, String, int).
        These values are taken from JOptionPane.
        • moYN = Shows the buttons Yes and No.
        • moOC = Shows the buttons OK and Cancel
        • moYNC = Shows the buttons Yes, No, and Cancel.
        • moOK = Value returned if OK was selected.
        • moCANCEL = Value returned if Cancel was selected.
        • moYES = Value returned if Yes was selected.
        • moNO = Value returned if No was selected.
        • moCLOSED = Value returned if the window was closed without the user selecting something
        See Also:
        JOptionPane, showQuestionMessage(String, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • moOC

      • showQuestionMessage

        public static int showQuestionMessage(java.lang.String mess,
                                      java.lang.String title,
                                      int mOptions)
        Deprecated. 
        Displays a JOptionPane dialog box that asks a question and returns the user's selection.
        Parameters:
        mess - Question to be displayed.
        title - Title of the Dialog box.
        mOptions - One of moYN, moOC, moYNC.
        Returns:
        Result from JOptionPane.showConfirmationMessage(...).

      • showMessage

        public static void showMessage(java.lang.String mess,
                               java.lang.String title,
                               int mType)
        Deprecated. 
        Displays a JOptionPane dialog box that displays a message. Calls JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String, int).
        Parameters:
        mess - Message to be displayed.
        title - Title of the dialog box.
        mType - One of mINF, mGEN, mASK, mWARN, or mERR.

        Parameters:
        message - Message to be displayed.
        initValue - Initial value of the text box.
        Returns:
        Contents of the input box.

      • addTitledBorder

        public static javax.swing.JComponent addTitledBorder(javax.swing.JComponent c,
                                                     java.lang.String title)
        Deprecated. 
        Calls JComponent.setBorder(new TitledBorder(new EmptyBorder(0,0,0,0),title)).
        Parameters:
        c - JComponent to add the TitledBorder to.
        title - The title to be set.
        Returns:
        The JComponent after setting a TitledBorder using an EmptyBorder and giving it title title.
        See Also:
        JComponent, BorderFactory

      • addTitledBorder

        @Deprecated
public static javax.swing.JComponent addTitledBorder(javax.swing.JComponent c,
                                                                  java.lang.String title,
                                                                  byte borderType)
        Deprecated. See BorderFactory
        Parameters:
        c - JComponent to add the border to.
        title - Title to be set.
        borderType - Type of border to use.
        Returns:
        The JComponent after setting a TitledBorder using the desired border type.
        See Also:
        TitledBorder, BorderFactory

      • addBorder

        @Deprecated
public static javax.swing.JComponent addBorder(javax.swing.JComponent c,
                                                            byte borderType)
        Deprecated. See BorderFactory
        Adds a border to any JComponent. It is recommended to wrap the JComponent in a JPanel first.
        Parameters:
        c - JComponent to add the border to.
        borderType - One of EmptyBorder, WhiteBorder, BlackBorder
        Returns:
        c with a border.
        See Also:
        BorderFactory

      • wrapInJPanel

        public static javax.swing.JPanel wrapInJPanel(javax.swing.JComponent[] c,
                                              java.awt.LayoutManager m,
                                              java.lang.Object[] args)
        Deprecated. 
        Mainly useful for GridBagLayout.
        c.length must equal args.length.
        Parameters:
        c - Array of JComponents to be added.
        m - LayoutManager to use.
        args - Arguments to use when adding elements in c.
        Returns:
        The resulting JPanel.
        null if c==null or args==null or m==null or c.length!=args.length
